thread.title: Washington Turns Attention to Yemen, Pleasing Gulf States
thread.title_full: Washington Turns Attention to Yemen, Pleasing Gulf States - WSJ

author: Yaroslav Trofimov
title: Washington Turns Attention to Yemen, Pleasing Gulf States
text:
Yemen’s simmering war is getting fresh attention from Washington—to the delight of Saudi Arabia and its Gulf allies, hopeful that President Donald Trump will choose the conflict as his first battleground to roll back Iran.

Saudi Arabia and other monarchies of the Gulf Cooperation Council have been fighting in Yemen since March 2015 in an attempt to restore President Abed Rabbo Mansour Hadi, ousted that year by the pro-Iranian Houthi militia. Yemen’s capital San’a and large parts of the country remain under Houthi...
